lines.name: Shadows and Dust

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: 0.2% of Attack Damage Leeched as Mana
0.2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana
Creates a Smoke Cloud on Rampage
Gain Unholy Might for 3 seconds on Rampage

lines.flavourText:
What is fear but a snuffed torch
and death in the wind?

lines.name: Ambu's Charge

explicitModifiers.text: Regenerate 2% of Life per second while on Low Life
Gain up to maximum Endurance Charges when you take a Critical Strike
Gain an Endurance Charge when you take a Critical Strike
Share Endurance Charges with nearby party members
Your nearby party members maximum Endurance Charges is equal to yours
Regenerate 2% of Life per second if you have been Hit Recently

lines.flavourText: Nothing stops the pain like a courageous rush into battle.

lines.name: Apep's Slumber

implicitModifiers.text: (5-10)% increased Spell Damage

explicitModifiers.text: +3% to all maximum Resistances while Poisoned
Regenerate (50-80) Energy Shield per Second per Poison on you, up to (250-400) per second

lines.name: Devoto's Devotion

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.flavourText:
Swift as thought are the actions of Man 
when borne on wings of divine providence.

lines.name: Cherrubim's Maleficence

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (30-100)% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech
(30-100)% increased Recovery per second from Life Leech

lines.flavourText:
"The Consort of Chaos descended,
swiftly, brutally, artfully, she consumed the living,
leaving naught behind but a Rosemarie bloom,
to celebrate the massacre."
- Blass, explorer, hunter, adventurer

lines.name: Goldrim

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Reflects 4 Physical Damage to Melee Attackers

lines.flavourText: No metal slips as easily through the fingers as gold.

lines.name: Maloney's Nightfall

implicitModifiers.text: (25-35)% increased Stun Duration on Enemies

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (5-10) to (8-16) Physical Damage to Bow Attacks
(5-10) to (8-16) Added Physical Damage with Bow Attacks
(10-25)% chance to create a Smoke Cloud when Hit
(20-60)% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments against Blinded Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Fear not the dark, the song of night,
Hear not the arch, the falling cry.
My giving sun, fight no more,
Rest alone, my grand nightfall.

lines.name: Aurseize

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.flavourText: Wealth is not to be borne lightly.

lines.name: Incandescent Heart

explicitModifiers.text: (0.8-1)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
(0.8-1)% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Gain (10-20)% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage
25% of Elemental Damage from Hits taken as Chaos Damage
Light Radius is based on Energy Shield instead of Life

lines.flavourText:
Only light may banish the shadows from this land
And the black lies wrapped around your heart

lines.name: Bones of Ullr

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of all Raise Zombie Gems
+1 to Level of all Raise Spectre Gems

lines.flavourText:
The dead man walks where
the living fear to tread.

lines.name: Deerstalker

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level (11-15) Trap
(15-30)% increased Movement Speed for 9 seconds on Throwing a Trap

lines.flavourText: Anticipation, preparation, exhilaration, celebration.

lines.name: Meginord's Vise

explicitModifiers.text: Melee Strike Skills deal Splash Damage to surrounding targets
Regenerate 2% of Life per second with at least 400 Strength
Melee Hits with Strike Skills always Knockback

lines.flavourText:
Ride with pride,
strike with vengeance,
live with honour.

lines.name: Lightpoacher

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Spirit Burst when you Use a Skill while you have a Spirit Charge
+1 to Maximum Spirit Charges per Abyss Jewel affecting you
Gain a Spirit Charge on Kill
(15-20)% chance to gain a Spirit Charge on Kill
Recover (4-5)% of Life when you lose a Spirit Charge
Gain 5% of Physical Damage as Extra Damage of each Element per Spirit Charge

lines.flavourText:
The eyes of the living hold a glimmer of hope.
Don't waste it.

lines.name: Carcass Jack

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.flavourText:
"...The discomfort shown by the others is amusing, but none
can deny that my work has made quite the splash..."
- Maligaro's Journal

lines.name: Crown of the Pale King

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (0.4-0.8)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Reflects 100 to 150 Physical Damage to Melee Attackers
30% of Damage you Reflect to Enemies when Hit is gained as Life
(30-100)% of Damage you Reflect to Enemies when Hit is leeched as Life

lines.flavourText:
A lightless world
a silent reign
two sightless eyes
feed on your pain.

lines.name: Geofri's Crest

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to maximum number of Summoned Holy Relics
Summoned Holy Relics have (20-25)% reduced Cooldown Recovery Rate

lines.flavourText:
In the battle for honour, Geofri won.
Not so, the battle for survival.

lines.name: Steppan Eard

explicitModifiers.text: 20% increased Movement Speed on Shocked Ground
Regenerate 2% of Life per second on Chilled Ground

lines.flavourText:
To fight an enemy on their lands is a tactical mistake. 
Make those lands your own, and the mistake becomes theirs.

lines.name: Esh's Mirror

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 10 Lightning Damage for each Shocked Enemy you've Killed Recently

lines.flavourText:
She looked upon her reflection
and trembled, and shook,
until she was not what she saw.

<default>{This item can be transformed with a Blessing of Esh}

lines.name: Tanu Ahi

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (2-3)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life

10% chance to gain Adrenaline for 2 Seconds when Leech is
removed by Filling Unreserved Life

10% chance to gain Onslaught for 4 Seconds when Leech is
removed by Filling Unreserved Life

lines.flavourText:
There is no greater thrill than leaping into combat,
slashing and hewing with utmost abandon.

lines.name: Chalice of Horrors

implicitModifiers.text: 9% increased Movement Speed

explicitModifiers.text: +(1-3) to Level of Socketed Curse Gems
+20% Chance to Block Attack Damage from Cursed Enemies
Inflict Decay on Enemies you Curse with Hex Skills, dealing 700 Chaos Damage per Second for 8 Seconds
(10-100)% Chance to Cause Monster to Flee on Block
Curse Skills have 100% increased Skill Effect Duration
1% of Damage Leeched as Life against Cursed Enemies

lines.flavourText: An eye for an eye. A curse for a curse.

lines.name: Daresso's Defiance

explicitModifiers.text: (0.4-2)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
(0.4-2)% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life
You lose all Endurance Charges when Hit
You gain an Endurance Charge on Kill
You gain Onslaught for 1 second per Endurance Charge when Hit
You gain Onslaught for (2-5) seconds per Endurance Charge when Hit
(60-100)% increased Effect of Onslaught on you

lines.flavourText:
"When your back is against the wall,
And your opponent is bleeding you dry,
There is only one appropriate response:
Unbridled, overwhelming violence."
- Daresso, the Sword King

lines.name: Icetomb

explicitModifiers.text: 20% chance to Freeze Enemies for 1 second when they Hit you

lines.flavourText:
When Solaris closes her burning eye
At the end of time,
the world will perish in ice.

lines.name: Soul Mantle

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level (14-20) Spell Totem
+1 to maximum number of Summoned Totems
Inflicts a random Level 20 Curse on you when your Totems die
Inflicts a random Hex on you when your Totems die, with 80% increased Effect
Inflicts a random Hex on you when your Totems die, with 80% more Effect
Inflicts a random Hex on you when your Totems die

lines.flavourText:
The greatest mistakes cause suffering 
long after they have been made

lines.name: Starkonja's Head

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: 50% reduced Damage when on Low Life
(50-150)% increased Global Evasion Rating when on Low Life

lines.flavourText:
There was no hero made out of Starkonja's death,
but merely a long sleep made eternal.

lines.name: Wake of Destruction

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 120 Lightning Damage to Attacks
Drops Shocked Ground while moving, lasting 2 seconds
10% chance to Cause Monsters to Flee

lines.flavourText:
Tempest's power given form,
Flee before the walking storm.

lines.name: Ralakesh's Impatience

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Gain a Frenzy, Endurance, or Power Charge once per second while you are Stationary

Count as having maximum number of Endurance Charges
Count as having maximum number of Frenzy Charges
Count as having maximum number of Power Charges
Corrupted Blood cannot be inflicted on you

Minimum Endurance Charges equal to Maximum while stationary
Minimum Frenzy Charges equal to Maximum while stationary
Minimum Power Charges equal to Maximum while stationary
Lose all Frenzy, Endurance, and Power Charges when you Move
Count as having maximum number of Endurance Charges
Count as having maximum number of Frenzy Charges
Count as having maximum number of Power Charges

lines.flavourText:
The Master of a Million Faces lived by one
simple ethos: why make the effort, when
you can simply mimic what others have?

lines.name: Leer Cast

explicitModifiers.text: You and nearby allies gain (15-50)% increased Damage

lines.flavourText: For none of us are as cruel as all of us.

lines.name: Surgebinders

explicitModifiers.text: (4-7)% increased Elemental Damage per Frenzy Charge
(4-7)% increased Physical Damage per Endurance Charge
(4-7)% increased Spell Damage per Power Charge
10% chance to Steal Power, Frenzy, and Endurance Charges on Hit
(10-30)% reduced Endurance, Frenzy and Power Charge Duration

lines.flavourText:
Your lies are our strength.
Your threats are our laughter.
Your hate is our infinity
The fire rises!

lines.name: Veruso's Battering Rams

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: 4% increased Melee Damage per Endurance Charge
You cannot be Shocked while at maximum Endurance Charges

lines.flavourText:
With unending determination and resolve he destroyed first the gates, 
then the constructs guarding the tomb on the other side.

lines.name: Asphyxia's Wrath

implicitModifiers.text: (20-30)% increased Global Accuracy Rating
Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Gain 20% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage
40% reduced Area of Effect of Curse Skills
40% reduced Area of Effect of Hex Skills
Curses on Slain Enemies are transferred to a nearby Enemy
Hexes on Slain Enemies are transferred to a nearby Enemy
Hexes Transfer to all Enemies in a range of 30 when Hexed Enemy dies
Hexes Transfer to all Enemies within 3 metres when Hexed Enemy dies

lines.flavourText:
Mist of breath
Icing to lips and throat
As the warm ones choke and fall
Upon the frozen wasteland.

lines.name: Shavronne's Pace

explicitModifiers.text: (20-35)% increased Movement Speed when on Full Life

lines.flavourText:
Shavronne raced to Brutus' side,
her last hope against the Karui tide.

lines.name: The Broken Crown

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are supported by Level 20 Cast on Death
20% increased Damage when on Low Life

lines.flavourText: Every rule has an exception.

lines.name: Doedre's Tenure

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.flavourText:
While Doedre lacked Maligaro's sense of style,
she surpassed her master in pure malevolence.

lines.name: Infernal Mantle

explicitModifiers.text: +(1-3) to Level of Socketed Fire Gems
15% of Fire Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
(15-100)% increased Spell Damage taken when on Low Mana

lines.flavourText:
Despair hums, softly, deadly, in the bones of my enemies. 
Eyes will burn, and souls wither, as they bask in my radiance.

lines.name: Wanderlust

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.flavourText: All the world is my home.

lines.name: Daresso's Courage

implicitModifiers.text: (120-180)% increased Block Recovery

explicitModifiers.text: +(30-36)% Chance to Block Spell Damage while on Low Life
+(20-100)% Chance to Block Attack Damage if you have Blocked Spell Damage Recently
+(20-100)% chance to Block Spell Damage if you have Blocked Attack Damage Recently

lines.flavourText:
By tourney's end, Daresso bled and shivered.
Yet even accursed treachery failed to steal the champion's victory.

lines.name: Honourhome

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to (13-30) Lightning Damage to Spells and Attacks
+20% to all Elemental Resistances while on Low Life
20% reduced Mana Cost of Skills when on Low Life

lines.flavourText:
"The craven mind is sharp with self interest.
The honourable mind is much easier to manipulate."
 - Malachai the Soulless

lines.name: Lightning Coil

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to (20-30) Lightning Damage to Attacks
(30-50)% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Lightning Damage

lines.flavourText:
"There's nothing like imminent death
to galvanize one's purpose in life."
- Malachai the Soulless.

lines.name: Lioneye's Paws

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 5 Rain of Arrows when you Attack with a Bow
Adds 12 to 24 Fire Damage to Attacks
40% reduced Movement Speed when on Low Life
Cannot be Stunned when on Low Life

lines.flavourText:
Stand and lead the righteous pride,
Fight till death, never hide.

lines.name: Malachai's Simula

explicitModifiers.text: Spells have a 20% chance to deal Double Damage

lines.flavourText:
It was a sliver of Malachai's soul
that animated the first Eternal Guardian.

lines.name: Slitherpinch

explicitModifiers.text: 0.6% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
0.4% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana

lines.flavourText:
A soft caress in dead of night,
that slips about the neck, so tight.

lines.name: Voll's Protector

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Gain a Power Charge for each Enemy you hit with a Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
Although a great leader during the war,
Voll proved disastrous in times of peace.
